attributes.action: keep the legal age of smoking 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would be stupid to put the age up to 18 as most kids who already smoke are going to rebel and will just get older people to buy them and so therefore it would make much more sence to keep the legal age at 16

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smoke16/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
